mapper.insert: insert into sc_grid (id, grid_no, name, community_id, comment, marker_status, longitude, latitude, create_time, creator_id, modify_time) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{gridNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{communityId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{comment,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{markerStatus,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{longitude,jdbcType=REAL}, #{latitude,jdbcType=REAL}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{creatorId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.update: update sc_grid set grid_no = #{gridNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, community_id = #{communityId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, comment = #{comment,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, marker_status = #{markerStatus,jdbcType=TINYINT}, longitude = #{longitude,jdbcType=REAL}, latitude = #{latitude,jdbcType=REAL}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, creator_id = #{creatorId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, modify_time = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, grid_no, name, community_id, comment, marker_status, longitude, latitude, create_time, creator_id, modify_time from sc_grid where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select id, grid_no, name, community_id, comment, marker_status, longitude, latitude, create_time, creator_id, modify_time from sc_grid
